channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Communications Inc. -- Zoom Workplace Apps, SDKs, Rooms Clients, and Rooms Controllers
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Communications Inc. -- Zoom Workplace Apps, SDKs, Rooms Clients, and Rooms Controllers

item.title: CVE-2024-39822|2024-08-16T19:18:44.815Z -- zoom%20communications%20inc. -- zoom%20workplace%20apps%2C%20sdks%2C%20rooms%20clients%2C%20and%20rooms%20controllers
item.description: Sensitive information exposure in some Zoom Workplace Apps, SDKs, Rooms Clients, and Rooms Controllers may allow an authenticated user to conduct an information disclosure via network access.
